intro: Biebersteinia odora, commonly known as the fragrant biebersteinia, is a flowering plant native to South Africa. It belongs to the Acanthaceae family and is characterized by its striking, showy flowers that range in color from pink to red. The plant produces small, oval-shaped leaves that are often covered in fine hairs. Biebersteinia odora thrives in well-drained soil and prefers full sun to partial shade. Its ornamental value makes it a popular choice for gardeners interested in cultivating exotic and visually appealing plants.
